name: Hello Black Edition
description:
The fun and functional all purpose skateboard. Our new offspring of the acclaimed Hello board is updated with a modern new shape and wrapped with a coat of fresh colors. Each Hello Black Edition board is pressed, shaped, screen printed and assembled in our Southern California studio with quality components and utmost care and commitment to detail. Hello is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

Limited Edition

Designed by Antonio Carusone

7 Ply Maple Veneer Deck with Concave, Slight Upturn in Nose and Single Kick (28" x 8.25")

Z-Flex 5" Trucks

62mm 78 Durometer Urethane Wheels

Sealed Dual Shield Precision Steel Ball Bearings

Custom Laser Cut Griptape with Logo

 Each deck is hand made in Southern California and arrives to you fully assembled and ready to ride.

name: Slide 35
description:
Like to go sideways down hills? Like to have utmost confidence and control? So do we, and that is why we developed the Slide Thirty-Five. Nothing beats the feeling of buzzing through canyons connected only by the wheels and wood on which you stand. Negotiating steep drops and drifting through corners at high speeds requires a dose of skill, a heavy hit of courage and equipment that you can trust. We developed the Slide Thirty-Five with total control in mind. Stripping the deck of anything unnecessary, to give you a solid platform for complete board control. We have extended the nose and tail areas of this deck to give plenty of leverage and pop for ollie's and shuv-it maneuvers. The "Thirty-Five" with it's brick like shape, is the perfect compliment to any riders looking to spend as much time going sideways as straight. Drift, Slide, Spin and Ride! Slide 35 is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

- Shaped by Buddy Carr

- Graphics by Antonio Carusone

- 7 Ply Maple Veneer (8 7/8" x 34.5")

- 16 1/8" Wheelbase

- 7" Nose, 7" Tail - Independent Trucks

- 70mm 78 Durometer Metro Wheels

- Precision ABEC 7 Ball Bearings

- Full Griptape

- Made in the USA

name: Spinto
description:
Welcome to the world of Long Distance Pushing (LDP) where efficiency and stamina is the name of the game. Our Spinto is designed for getting you through your journey with the least amount of energy and maximum amount of comfort. How did we do this? The Spinto has one of the deepest drops of any decks, at nearly 2 inches, the Spinto sits extremely low to the ground. By dropping the deck as low as possible, we have allowed the rider to have an easier and more efficient push than standard top mount decks. The low deck height also allows the rider to foot brake with more control than traditional decks, as sometimes negotiating traffic can be brutal, stopping shouldn't be. We have pressed the Spinto with a medium depth concave that cups your feet securely, a perfect blend that doesn't cause any foot discomfort on those double digit distances days. If you are a serious LDP pusher or a casual weekend warrior, the Spinto delivers the perfect balance between performance, quality and stunningly great looks. Spinto is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

- Shaped by Buddy Carr

- Graphics by Antonio Carusone

- 8 Ply Maple Veneer, 2" Drop, Medium Concave (9.25' x 41.25" / 32.75 wheelbase)

- Cast Aluminum Paris Trucks

- 77mm 78 Durometer Metro Express Model Wheels

- Precision ABEC Ball Bearings

- Full Griptape

- Made in the USA

name: Hello Tank
description:
Screen Printed on 100% Combed Ringspun Cotton

Super-soft, Lightweight, Slimfit

Machine Washable and Preshrunk to Minimize Shrinkage

Color: Black, White

name: Skate Tool
description:
Swiss made Skate Tool. Sleek, modern and compact. Made for us in the small village of Champagne, Switzerland, this compact tool is the perfect size for on the go adjustments. Think of it as the Swiss Army Knife of skateboard tools. When there is no room for a big bulky skate tool look no further, its small size is its biggest advantage.

Details

- Swiss Made

- 9/16” Wrench

- 1/2” Wrench

- 3/8” Wrench

- Phillips Head Screwdriver

name: Grand Prix 30
description:
Our Grand Prix 30 promises to be the best 30 inch longboard you have ever ridden.Lightweight, nimble fast, with stunning graphics, the Grand Prix 30, packs in performance and classic style. Pressed in the USA, using Canadian Maple, the deck itself features a slight concave with a single kick and is topped off with custom laser cut grip tape that carries the design of the deck to the top. Graphics have been applied using traditional hand screen-printing techniques, making each board a work of art. The Grand Prix 30 comes equipped with USA made wheels, using the highest grade urethanes and specific formulations for speed and traction. The wheels are loaded with Abec rated precision bearings and accurately sized bearing spacers for better rotation and longer bearing life. For trucks, we have chosen Gunmetal classic sand cast aluminum trucks that give the new Grand Prix 30 the right amount of turn radius, as well as the stability for higher speeds. With it's slimmed down size and lighter weight, your new Grand Prix 30 inch longboard, will add excitement to your commute and lightness to your load. Grand Prix 30 is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

- Shaped by Buddy Carr

- Graphics by Antonio Carusone

- 7 Ply Maple Veneer, Single Kick, Slight Concave (8" x 30")

- Cast Aluminum Gunmetal Trucks

- 62mm 78 Durometer Wheels

- Precision ABEC Ball Bearings

- Custom Laser Cut Griptape

name: Barre de Chocolat
description:
When I was shaping this board for free riding and commuting, I wanted to make a board that was lightweight, turned well and featured a kick tail, so that getting the nose up and over curbs would be simple and effortless. This well designed kick tail also makes modern, street tricks like shuvits, ollies and kick flips a breeze. We’ve built a medium depth concave into “Chocolat”, enough for sure foot placement, yet with ample room for foot adjustment during trick set up. “Chocolat” has a unique rail design, that provides room for maximum wheel clearance and continues through the entire belly of the board, creating a visually stunning and functional bottom side. We carried that same look and feel onto the top and layered “Chocolat” with a meticulously cut sheet of grip tape that carries that same good look, while supplying plenty of foot traction at the same time. The colour-matched 70mm 80 durometer, center set-bearing wheels, provide plenty of roll speed. With their hand- sanded riding surface, predictable and controllable slides are the norm. As for the trucks, we have chosen Buck Trucks; these high quality 180mm aluminum trucks, allow the rider to get in and out of deep turns with confidence and control. “Barre de Chocolat” is wrapped in a stunning graphic, produced by Antonio Carusone. Covered in a combination of Pantone numbers 525 and 263,our new complete skateboard, “Chocolat” has a mouthwatering appearance. Barre de Chocolat is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

- Shaped by Buddy Carr

- Graphics by Antonio Carusone

- 7 Ply Maple Veneer (35.5 x 9.5 ")

- 21.5" Wheelbase

- Custom CNC Routed Wheels Wells and Rails

- Buck Trucks 180mm

- 70mm 80 Durometer Wheels

- Precision ABEC Ball Bearings

- Custom Laser Cut Griptape

name: 66 Signature Model
description:
With inspiration coming from classic Porsche and Ford race team colours, you’ll look and feel as cool as Steve McQueen on our new “66”. Our “66” model was designed from the top down with one thing in mind, pools and parks. When you first step onto the deck, you will notice your feet stay firmly planted where you place them. We spent countless hours, developing the perfect concave for pools and parks, a concave that keeps your feet where you want them. We call this new concave, “vice” for obvious reasons. The unique fade away shape of the “66” adds flare and removes some of the bulk where you don’t need it. For trucks, we have chosen Independent stage 10 trucks, ridden by nearly every top pool and park skater from California to New York. Simply put, these trucks work. Your “66” is assembled with our 63mm 83 duro custom wheels. We produced these wheels slightly softer, which make skating rougher pools and parks and even streets, a breeze. The “66” is, of course, finished off with a laser cut sheet of high traction grip tape and arrives to you fully assembled, tuned and ready to rip. Whether just starting, or a seasoned pool and park skate veteran, our “66” can take all you dish out and give you the confidence and comfort to take your skating to the next level. The 66 Signature Complete is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

- Shaped by Buddy Carr

- Graphics by Antonio Carusone

- 7 Ply Maple Veneer (9" x 32")

- 15" Wheelbase

- Independent Stage 10 trucks

- 62mm 83 Durometer Wheels

- Precision ABEC 7 Ball Bearings

- Custom Laser Cut Griptape

name: Velocita Longboard
description:
In Italy L’ESIGENZA DELLA VELOCITÀ simply means “The Need for Speed“ . Taking cues from high performance European autos, the Velocita is a standout among many in both look and ride. Beginning with the deck, we pressed 8 ply’s of maple veneers in our deepest concave to give sure-foot placement and lateral strength, thus eliminating virtually all flex. Next we developed what we call our drop flush, truck mount system. Our unique truck mount system allows us to lower the deck height, which puts the rider closer to the ground, for more comfort and control. The deck also features our unique shelf for the truck to rest on, which creates a seamless, uninterrupted view from nose to tail. Your Velocita comes equipped with our all new, dual hub wheel design. Unlike any wheel in the past, the Velocita wheel is guaranteed to give you traction when you need it and yet, remain predictable when allowed to slide. Flat spotting is non-existent and our urethanes far outperforms and outlasts all others. We fit all of our wheels with high precision bearings and 10mm bearing spacers for a sure fit and good roll. We have chosen to equip the Velocita with trucks from Paris. With Paris’s deep carving characteristics and responsiveness into and out of turns, the combination of the Velocita and Paris is a perfect pairing. L’Esigenza Della Velocita, with its aggressive stance and low center of gravity is our most aggressive design to date. The L’Esigenza Della Velocita Longboard is a collaboration between California based skateboarder Buddy Carr and New York based graphic designer Antonio Carusone.

Details

Limited Edition of 100

Designed by Antonio Carusone

8 Ply Maple Veneer with a Deep Concave (10" x 38")

28" Wheelbase

Drop Through / Flush Mount Truck System

Paris Trucks 180mm

72mm 78 Durometer Dual Core Urethane Wheels (Sanded Rolling Surface)

Precision ABEC 7 Ball Bearings

Custom Laser Cut Griptape

name: Aldo T-Shirt
description:
Our Aldo T-shirt shot by the renowned French photographer Aldo Sperber, is a masterpiece unto itself. Shot at La Défense in Paris, this T-shirt is the first in a series of images shot by Aldo Sperber for Buddy Carr Skateboards. Your Aldo T-shirt arrives in a custom printed and sealed box.

- Shot by Aldo Sperber
- Screen Printed on 100% Cotton Jersey Blanks by Alternative Apparel

- Colors: White
